overview_summary: None of these four adjacent landowners have a publicly documented stance on development, with all noted stances classified as Unknown. All appear to have limited public roles or influence in the community – no high-influence officials were identified among these neighbors.

neighbors.name: Anthony J. & Debra A. Hofmann
neighbors.claims: Debra A. Hofmann is listed as residing at 4705 E County Road 900 S in rural Cloverdale, Putnam County (info as of Jan 2024) [LocateFamily](https://www.locatefamily.com/H/HOF/HOFMANN-279.html). Public records confirm the Hofmanns as local landowners, but no news articles or civic roles were found associated with them [Putnam County Assessor](https://co.putnam.in.us/assessor).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowners; no public roles noted

approach_recommendations.engage: Initiate personal outreach with the Hofmanns to build rapport and understand any concerns. Emphasize listening to their views and providing information, as they have not publicly stated positions.

neighbors.name: Cynthia L. Ogborn
neighbors.claims: Cynthia L. “Cindy” Ogborn resides at 4690 E County Road 875 S in Cloverdale, Indiana, per publicly available directory data [LocateFamily](https://www.locatefamily.com/O/OGB/OGBORN-6.html). Her property spans roughly 12.7 acres with a home built in 1994, according to real estate records [Trulia](https://www.trulia.com/home/4690-e-county-road-875-e-cloverdale-in-46120-228052413). No online record of civic involvement or statements on development was found under her name.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach Ms. Ogborn in a neighborly manner, perhaps via a mutual acquaintance. Share project details and ask about her priorities (e.g., property upkeep or quiet) to address any unspoken concerns.

neighbors.name: Jami K. & Richard “Shane” Cox
neighbors.claims: Jami K. Cox and her husband Richard “Shane” Cox are identified in county land records as co-owners of parcels in this part of Putnam County [Putnam County Assessor](https://co.putnam.in.us/assessor). Aside from property ownership, no news articles, public posts, or official roles could be found linking the Cox family to community or development issues. Their public profile appears minimal.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Cox family through a direct but informal introduction. Since they have no evident public stance, provide clear information and invite them to ask questions or share any concerns privately.

neighbors.name: Michael E. Smith
neighbors.claims: Michael E. Smith is listed as the owner of a parcel in this vicinity, per Putnam County property records [Putnam County Assessor](https://co.putnam.in.us/assessor). We found no public commentary, social media presence, or civic roles associated with this individual. His engagement with local issues, if any, is not documented in accessible sources.

approach_recommendations.engage: A low-key, personal outreach is advised. With no known public stance or role, Mr. Smith should be approached one-on-one to introduce the project, ensuring he knows how to reach out with any questions or feedback.
